translated: If one drinks it in combination with either goat's milk or grape wine, it cures retention of urine and obstruction by gravel.

original: 'o ma dang sbyar na rlung skran sel to //
analyzed: 'o ma dang sbyar na rlung skran sel to //
translated: If one drinks it in combination with milk, it cures tumors caused by wind.

original: mig ser dang / skya rbab dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / skyugs pa dang / mdze dang / rims dang / bad kan nyi tshe dang / khrag lud pa nyi tshe ba rnams kyis ni btung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mig ser dang / skya rbab dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / skyugs pa dang / mdze dang / rims dang / bad kan nyi tshe dang / khrag lud pa nyi tshe ba rnams kyis ni btung bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not drink it if one has jaundice, edema, fever, vomiting, leprosy, contagious fever, slight phlegm, or slight blood in the sputum.

original: go byi'i cho ga ni go byi'i 'bras bu lnga cho ga bzhin du @285b ba'i gcin gyi nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus nas mnyes la tshig ma bor ba'i khu ba grang mo mchu dang rkan mar gyis bskus te btung zhing thabs de ltar nyin gcig bzhin
analyzed: go byi'i cho ga ni go byi'i 'bras bu lnga cho ga bzhin du @285b ba'i gcin gyi nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus nas mnyes la tshig ma bor ba'i khu ba grang mo mchu dang rkan mar gyis bskus te btung zhing thabs de ltar nyin gcig bzhin
translated: The procedure for the Indian jujube is as follows: Boil five Indian jujube fruits according to procedure in one's own urine, reduce it to one-fourth, strain it, and drink the cool liquid without letting it lose its potency. Smear the lips and palate with ghee, and drink it daily in this way.

original: du go byi'i 'bras bu lnga lngas bskyed /
analyzed: du go byi'i 'bras bu lnga lngas bskyed /
translated: The five results of the decoction are produced.

original: go byi'i 'bras bu bdun cu la thug gi bar du snga ma bzhin du btung /
analyzed: go byi'i 'bras bu bdun cu la thug gi bar du snga ma bzhin du btung /
translated: The decoction is taken until the seventy results are reached, as before.

original: de nas nyin re bzhin lnga lngas phri ste /
analyzed: de nas nyin re bzhin lnga lngas phri ste /
translated: Then, it is reduced by five each day.

original: 'brum bu lnga la thug nas slar yang de bzhin du bskyed cing dbri'o //
analyzed: 'brum bu lnga la thug nas slar yang de bzhin du bskyed cing dbri'o //
translated: When it reaches five boils, it is again increased and reduced in the same way.

original: sman 'thungs pa zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas ni 'bras chan grang mo mar dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa dang ldan par bza' bya ste /
analyzed: sman 'thungs pa zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas ni 'bras chan grang mo mar dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa dang ldan par bza' bya ste /
translated: After the medicine has been digested, the diet should be cold rice gruel mixed with ghee and milk.

original: sman bcud kyi len gyi cho ga 'dis ni yid gzhungs par byed cing /
analyzed: sman bcud kyi len gyi cho ga 'dis ni yid gzhungs par byed cing /
translated: By this ritual of medicinal elixir, the mind becomes sharp.

original: gnyer ma dang skra dkar med par byed la /
analyzed: gnyer ma dang skra dkar med par byed la /
translated: It eliminates wrinkles and gray hair.

original: mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / khrag tshad dang srin bu'i nyes pa rnams sel to //
analyzed: mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / khrag tshad dang srin bu'i nyes pa rnams sel to //
translated: It cures leprosy, hemorrhoids, blood diseases, and worm infestations.

original: khu chu la nad yod par gyur pa yang sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: khu chu la nad yod par gyur pa yang sbyong bar byed do //
translated: It also purifies semen that has become diseased.

original: go byi'i mar nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing /
analyzed: go byi'i mar nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing /
translated: The decoction ghee is combined with strength.

original: zla ba gcig gi bar du ran par 'thungs na nad kyi gnod pa thams cad las thar te /
analyzed: zla ba gcig gi bar du ran par 'thungs na nad kyi gnod pa thams cad las thar te /
translated: If one drinks it in the proper amount for one month, one will be freed from all harm caused by illness.

original: lus brtan por lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus brtan por lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One’s body will be firm, and one will live for one hundred years.

original: me dang nyi ma 'de ba dang / nyin par gnyid log pa dang / 'bru mar dang / kha zas lci ba rnams ni spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: me dang nyi ma 'de ba dang / nyin par gnyid log pa dang / 'bru mar dang / kha zas lci ba rnams ni spang bar bya'o //
translated: One should avoid fire, the sun, sleeping during the day, oil, and heavy foods.

original: sman gyi mjug bcad nas kyang ji srid kyi bar du sman btang ba'i dus kyi nyis 'gyur gyi bar du cho ga bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sman gyi mjug bcad nas kyang ji srid kyi bar du sman btang ba'i dus kyi nyis 'gyur gyi bar du cho ga bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: After finishing the medicine, one should observe the ritual for twice the period of time during which the medicine was taken.

original: mkhris pa shas che ba'i mi la ni /
analyzed: mkhris pa shas che ba'i mi la ni /
translated: For a person with an excess of bile,

original: sman 'di byed pa'i tshe khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / lus skrangs pa dang / rims la sogs pas 'debs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sman 'di byed pa'i tshe khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / lus skrangs pa dang / rims la sogs pas 'debs par 'gyur te /
translated: when this medicine is being prepared, boils may appear in the mouth, the body may swell, and one may be afflicted by fever and so forth.

original: de la ni sman bsil ba'i lde gu'am khu ba grang mos lus byug pa dang / steng du blugs pa dang btung ba rnams bya'o //
analyzed: de la ni sman bsil ba'i lde gu'am khu ba grang mos lus byug pa dang / steng du blugs pa dang btung ba rnams bya'o //
translated: In that case, one should apply a cool medicinal paste or drink a cool medicinal drink.🔽The ritual for growing black pepper

original: pi pi ling bskyed pa'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: pi pi ling bskyed pa'i cho ga ni /
translated: is as follows:

original: 'o ma bskol te phyed du nas phyung ba'i nang du /
analyzed: 'o ma bskol te phyed du nas phyung ba'i nang du /
translated: Boil milk and remove half of the water.

original: pi pi ling 'brum bu lnga btags te btung zhing /🔽de ltar zhag bcu'i bar du nyin re zhing pi pi ling 'brum bu lnga lngas bskyed de btung bar bya'o //
analyzed: pi pi ling 'brum bu lnga btags te btung zhing / de ltar zhag bcu'i bar du nyin re zhing pi pi ling 'brum bu lnga lngas bskyed de btung bar bya'o //
translated: Add five seeds of long pepper and drink.🔽In this way, increase the number of long pepper seeds by five each day for ten days.

original: de nas nyin re zhing pi pi ling lnga lngas phri ste //
analyzed: de nas nyin re zhing pi pi ling lnga lngas phri ste //
translated: Then, decrease the number of long pepper seeds by five each day.

original: pi pi ling 'brum lnga la thug nas /
analyzed: pi pi ling 'brum lnga la thug nas /
translated: When the number of long pepper seeds reaches five,

original: yang snga ma bzhin du bskyed cing phri la @286a * //
analyzed: yang snga ma bzhin du bskyed cing phri la @286a * //
translated: increase and decrease as before.

original: kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing cho gas bsrungs na /
analyzed: kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing cho gas bsrungs na /
translated: If one eats food with milk and protects it with the ritual,

original: dreg dang / skya rbab dang / skran dang / gzhang 'brum dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrangs pa dang / dmu rdzings rnams sel zhing rims ldang dub kyis dus mi 'dra ba med par byed do //
analyzed: dreg dang / skya rbab dang / skran dang / gzhang 'brum dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrangs pa dang / dmu rdzings rnams sel zhing rims ldang dub kyis dus mi 'dra ba med par byed do //
translated: it will cure leprosy, edema, tumors, hemorrhoids, dyspnea, swelling, and dropsy, and make the onset of fever unpredictable.

original: ro tsa bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ro tsa bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It becomes a panacea.

original: brag zhun gser dang lcags la sogs pa las 'byung ste /
analyzed: brag zhun gser dang lcags la sogs pa las 'byung ste /
translated: Sulphate of iron comes from gold, iron, and so forth.

original: de dag ni mthu dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: de dag ni mthu dang ldan zhing /
translated: They are powerful and

original: de dag gi mdog dang 'dra la /
analyzed: de dag gi mdog dang 'dra la /
translated: It is good if it is the color of those,

original: ba gcin gyi dri bro ba dang / snum zhing lci la rdo med pa bzang ste /
analyzed: ba gcin gyi dri bro ba dang / snum zhing lci la rdo med pa bzang ste /
translated: smells like cow’s urine, is oily, heavy, and does not contain stones.

original: nges chu chus bkrus ba dang / ba gcin gyi nang du mnye bas chog bzhin du btul nas /
analyzed: nges chu chus bkrus ba dang / ba gcin gyi nang du mnye bas chog bzhin du btul nas /
translated: It is sufficient to wash the definite urine with water and to boil it in cow’s urine.

original: de'i phye mas nad gzhi gsum gang gi sman du btang ba de'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu bas lan mang du bsgo zhing bskams la /
analyzed: de'i phye mas nad gzhi gsum gang gi sman du btang ba de'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu bas lan mang du bsgo zhing bskams la /
translated: The flour of that [rice] is boiled many times in the liquid of a decoction of the class of medicine for whichever of the three humors it is a medicine for, and is dried.

original: nad gzhi gang gi sman du btang ba de'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na nad do cog sel to //
analyzed: nad gzhi gang gi sman du btang ba de'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na nad do cog sel to //
translated: If one drinks it mixed with the liquid of a decoction of the class of medicine for whichever of the three humors it is a medicine for, it cures all illnesses.

original: cho ga de bzhin du drub mar chang gi phye ma yang sman bskol ba'i khu bas bsgo zhing sbyar te 'thungs na nad do cog sel to //
analyzed: cho ga de bzhin du drub mar chang gi phye ma yang sman bskol ba'i khu bas bsgo zhing sbyar te 'thungs na nad do cog sel to //
translated: In the same way, one should drink the flour of the beer mixed with the liquid of a decoction of the class of medicine for whichever of the three humors it is a medicine for. It cures all illnesses.

original: sman 'di gnyis kyi cho ga byed pas thi ba'i sha dang / rgya sran bza' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sman 'di gnyis kyi cho ga byed pas thi ba'i sha dang / rgya sran bza' bar mi bya'o //
translated: When one is performing the rite of these two medicines, one should not eat dove meat and lentils.

original: aa ru ra'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: aa ru ra'i cho ga ni /
translated: The rite of yellow myrobalan is as follows.

original: aa ru ra'i phye ma rgyam tsha dang sbyar na rlung sel to //🔽mar dang sbyar na mkhris pa sel to //
analyzed: aa ru ra'i phye ma rgyam tsha dang sbyar na rlung sel to // mar dang sbyar na mkhris pa sel to //
translated: If one takes a powder of asafetida with rock salt, it will cure wind disorders.🔽If one takes it with ghee, it will cure bile disorders.

original: bca' sga dang sbyar na bad kan sel to //
analyzed: bca' sga dang sbyar na bad kan sel to //
translated: If one takes it with ginger, it will cure phlegm disorders.

original: bu ram dang sbyar na nad do cog sel to //
analyzed: bu ram dang sbyar na nad do cog sel to //
translated: If one takes it with molasses, it will cure all diseases.

original: skyu ru ra'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i cho ga ni /
translated: The procedure for āmalaka:

original: skyu ru ra'i khu ba phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa'i phul bcu drug btsags la /
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i khu ba phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa'i phul bcu drug btsags la /
translated: Take one prastha of āmalaka juice, which is eight pala in weight, and strain it sixteen times.

original: bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa'i nang du blugs te kha bcad nas yun ring du bzhag la /
analyzed: bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa'i nang du blugs te kha bcad nas yun ring du bzhag la /
translated: Pour it into a pot smeared with honey, cover it, and leave it for a long time.

original: dgun nam / dgun smad dam dbyar btung bar bya ste /🔽skyer khanda dang / 'o mar sbyar na khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba dang mkhris pa sel to //
analyzed: dgun nam / dgun smad dam dbyar btung bar bya ste / skyer khanda dang / 'o mar sbyar na khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba dang mkhris pa sel to //
translated: In winter or late winter or summer, one should drink it.🔽If one takes it with milk and ginger, it will cure blood disorders, upward movement of phlegm, and bile disorders.

original: kha ra dang sbyar na skya rbab kyi nad sel cing /
analyzed: kha ra dang sbyar na skya rbab kyi nad sel cing /
translated: If one takes it with sugar, it will cure ascites.

original: mo mtshan gyi khrag mi chod pa chod par byed do //
analyzed: mo mtshan gyi khrag mi chod pa chod par byed do //
translated: It will stop the bleeding of the vagina.

original: sbrang rtsir sbyar na bad kan gyi nad sel to //
analyzed: sbrang rtsir sbyar na bad kan gyi nad sel to //
translated: If one takes it with honey, it will cure phlegm disorders.

original: tsha ba gsum dang sbyang na drod chung ba las drod skyed par byed do //
analyzed: tsha ba gsum dang sbyang na drod chung ba las drod skyed par byed do //
translated: If one applies it with the three hot [herbs], it will generate heat from little heat.

original: sman so ma r'a dza dang sbyar na mdze nad sel to //
analyzed: sman so ma r'a dza dang sbyar na mdze nad sel to //
translated: If one applies it with the medicine somaraja, it will cure leprosy.

original: dug @286b mo nyung gi shun lbags dang sbyar na gzhang 'brum sel to //
analyzed: dug @286b mo nyung gi shun lbags dang sbyar na gzhang 'brum sel to //
translated: If one applies it with the outer skin of the fruit of the poison plant, it will cure hemorrhoids.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis tshe'i rig byed kyi rgya mtsho drang srong gzhung la skyes kyi bu dang / drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rnams bltas nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis tshe'i rig byed kyi rgya mtsho drang srong gzhung la skyes kyi bu dang / drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rnams bltas nas /
translated: Thus, I, having looked at the ocean of the Ayurveda, the texts of the sages, the texts of the sages Brihaspati, Ātreya, and so forth,

original: gso ba'i dpyad kyi zer tsam gyi rgyud le'u sum cu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams rim bzhin phab cing sbyar ba ni /
analyzed: gso ba'i dpyad kyi zer tsam gyi rgyud le'u sum cu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams rim bzhin phab cing sbyar ba ni /
translated: I have arranged in order and applied these thirty-one chapters of the Tantra of the Essence of the Science of Medicine.

original: pho bo lha bsrungs skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab pas byed du bcug nas /
analyzed: pho bo lha bsrungs skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab pas byed du bcug nas /
translated: This was done by order of Pho-bo lha-dbang who was afflicted with ascites.

original: de'i phyer sman dpyad 'di nyi mas bsrungs pas byas so //
analyzed: de'i phyer sman dpyad 'di nyi mas bsrungs pas byas so //
translated: Therefore, this medical work was composed by Nyis-ma bsgrungs-pa.

original: cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o /
analyzed: cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o /
translated: The thirty-first chapter on ritual.

original: // / sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: // / sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Essence of the Science of Medicine, called the “Accomplished One”

original: nub phyogs pa rta mkhan bgrod dkas bsrungs ba'i bu nyi mas bsrungs pas byas pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: nub phyogs pa rta mkhan bgrod dkas bsrungs ba'i bu nyi mas bsrungs pas byas pa rdzogs so //
translated: The son of a western horseman, protected by the sun, is finished.🔽The Indian preceptors Jinamitra, Atiga

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / aa ti rgya warma dang / lo ts'a ba bande tsandras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / aa ti rgya warma dang / lo ts'a ba bande tsandras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: varman, and the translator Bande Candrakīrti translated and finalized it.

original: bdag gis rig mchog gces grub 'di bris pas //🔽rlung mkhris bad kan nad gzhi dug gsum dang // 'phral gyi rkyen gyur nyon mongs gsum brgyad kyis //
analyzed: bdag gis rig mchog gces grub 'di bris pas // rlung mkhris bad kan nad gzhi dug gsum dang // 'phral gyi rkyen gyur nyon mongs gsum brgyad kyis //
translated: By my writing this Jewel of Supreme Knowledge,

original: mnar med sems can mtha' yas thams cad kun //
analyzed: mnar med sems can mtha' yas thams cad kun //
translated: May all sentient beings in the Avīci hell,

original: sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur nas nyam thag pa'i //
analyzed: sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur nas nyam thag pa'i //
translated: Suffering from the three humors, the three poisons,🔽And the eight afflictions of immediate conditions,

original: rlung mkhris dug gsum la sogs gtan spangs te //
analyzed: rlung mkhris dug gsum la sogs gtan spangs te //
translated: Be freed from the three poisons of wind, bile, and phlegm,🔽And from the three poisons of wind, bile, and phlegm,

original: sa rab bgrod dka' lam gyi nyes bsal nas //
analyzed: sa rab bgrod dka' lam gyi nyes bsal nas //
translated: And having cleared away the faults of the difficult path to be traversed,

original: g-yung drung bla med chen po myur thob shog //
analyzed: g-yung drung bla med chen po myur thob shog //
translated: May they quickly attain the supreme, unsurpassed path.
